text_block_list.text:
Finally having a day to relax, I head to<n>the shopping mall to
do some<n>browsing.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Hm... There are a plethora of<n>treatment oils here, but they're
all<n>glorified cooking oils that emphasize<n>fragrance over
quality.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
In that case, perhaps the baobab<n>seed oil from earlier will
do... But in<n>terms of permeability, it lacks the right<n>
ingredients. Hmph...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: T-Trainer?!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
What are you doing he—what am I<n>saying? You're obviously
shopping.<n>Still, this is quite the coincidence.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I was comparing the various hair oils<n>here. I'm just about
out of my current<n>supply.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I figured I would check if anything<n>new was available. Even
for the same<n>products, ingredients are often<n>changed to
suit the latest research.
choice_data_list: You sure put a lot of thought into it, huh?
You sure put a lot of thought into it, huh?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I suppose... But as you see, hair care<n>is an unceasing
struggle for me.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Come on, just look at it. My hair is...<n>well, it tends to become
rather frizzled.

Her hair does seem a little frizzy, but<n>it doesn't look all that
terrible to be<n>concerned about.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You don't... You surely don't believe<n>my hair is naturally like
this?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
This is the result of a maximum<n>amount of effort. Each day,
I style it to<n>minimize split ends, and my nighttime<n>routine is
far more complicated than<n>average.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: But... It's still not enough. My hair, it<n>won't...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
It's a shaggy mess of knots! Even<n>my stylist admitted
defeat against my<n>hyper tangles!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Yes. It's not the exact definition, but<n>I'm left with no choice
but to call it<n>that. My hair is an anomaly!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I use off-the-shelf products as well<n>as ones of my own
making. I even<n>tried an unnatural concoction of<n>
Tachyon's, but to no avail!
choice_data_list:
(Woah! Who is this, and what has she done to
Hayahide?!)

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
My agony begins the moment I wake<n>up in the morning.
Have you ever<n>jumped out of bed choking on your<n>own
hair?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: The rainy season is especiallyproblematic! Dealing with my hair hasnever been a source of joy. It is,rather, my mortal enemy.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
And people tell me to just cut it short.<n>But that would be the
worst move to<n>make! My face would look as big as<n>a race
track!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
It's not that I prefer it long, but that's<n>the bitter decision I
made after<n>considering the advantages of either<n>letting it
hang or tying it up. But of<n>course...

The frazzled genius continues airing<n>her hair grievances for
some time...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Sigh... How many times I'vewished to have straight hair likeBrian's.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I remember the shock when I first<n>braided her hair when we
were<n>children. The silky touch as I ran my<n>fingers through
it... I screamed, "How<n>can our hair be so different?!"

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I even tried holding my hair down with<n>our father's
pomade... But of course, it<n>would never feel silky like
Brian's<n>that way. It was hopeless.

I picture how adorable she must have<n>been glopping
pomade on her hair,<n>and I can't hold in my smile.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Wha... Are you laughing?! I'm pouring<n>my heart out here!
choice_data_list:
Ah, I was just thinking about how you always
give it your all.

text_block_list.name: Store Clerk
text_block_list.text:
Um, excuse me, miss? You seem to<n>be having trouble
deciding. Is there<n>anything I can help you with?

text_block_list.name: Store Clerk
text_block_list.text:
Apologies for overhearing, but I<n>understand that you're
having some<n>trouble with your hair. Perhaps I could<n>
recommend our—

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: N-No, I'm fine... Thank you anyway.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Let's take our leave now.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I, um, apologize for earlier. I become<n>somewhat... animated
when it comes<n>to hair.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But shouting in a public space like<n>that without an ounce of
self-control... I<n>must've looked pathetic.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: What?

I tell her just how incredible I think<n>she is. How she always
strives to<n>improve herself, and how she always<n>puts her
whole heart into a challenge.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You praise me too much... I'm simply<n>figuring out my
problems through trial<n>and error. If my hair was any good to<n>
begin with, I would've never put the<n>effort in.
choice_data_list: But all that effort made you who you are today.
But all that effort made you who you are today.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
That's... possible, I suppose. From all<n>the anguish my hair
gave me, I may<n>have gained the determination never<n>to
give in.
choice_data_list: Then maybe it wasn't all that bad, right?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But... that's a matter of hindsight.<n>Let's not make light of
the suffering I<n>went through all that time.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I swear... your interpretation of the<n>data is truly unique. Not
at all like mine.<n>But that's why I like talking with you.

I think my words have begun to sink<n>in, as I see her
expression soften. In<n>that case...
choice_data_list:
Anyway, I think your hair is fluffy and
wonderful.

Anyway, I think your hair is fluffy and
wonderful.

text_block_list.text: I simply tell her my honest opinion,<n>but...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Let me stop you right there. That is<n>one comment I cannot
overlook.<n>Though I do appreciate your opinion<n>and kind
words.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
However, if that's the conclusion you<n>drew from our
conversation just now,<n>I must say that your reasoning is<n>
flawed.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: There is a need to deliberate once<n>more about this matter.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
There's no backing out now. As my<n>trainer, you must
understand the pain I<n>go through as much as I do.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Now, get comfortable. It's time I toldyou my tragic life story. Noobjections.

We go to a cafe, and I try as hard as I<n>can to listen to
Hayahide's<n>passion-fueled Theory of Frizzy Hair.<n>Now I
truly understand how she<n>feels... I think.
